summary: September 14 is the 257th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Charles Crichton  was an English film director and editor. Born in Wallasey, Cheshire, he became best known for directing many comedies produced at Ealing Studios and had a 40-year career editing and directing many films and television programmes. Crichton gained two Academy Award nominations for A Fish Called Wanda, including Best Director and Best Original Screenplay.
title: Charles Crichton
